程序包 cn.campusapp.pan.autorender

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    AutoRender
    Trigger render on shown, which means these cases: Activity.onResume Fragment.onResume Fragment.setUserVisibleHint(true) Created by nius on 7/29/15.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AutoRenderControllerLifecyclePlugin
    Trigger render on shown, which means these cases: Activity.onResume Fragment.onResume Fragment.setUserVisibleHint(true) Created by nius on 10/13/15.
    AutoRenderViewModel
    Automatically trigger render on particular lifecycle status: Activity.onResume/Fragment.onResume Fragment.setUserVisibleHint(true) Configure it using AutoRenderViewModel.autoRender() and AutoRenderViewModel.autoRender(boolean) Created by nius on 10/13/15.
